subject: ATTENTION
body:
ATTENTION
 
This is to notify you that your funds has been approved and was
deposited with TNT delivery company this morning for registration and
we agreed up that the delivery of Your $25,000,000.00,
 
contact with your full info where your funds will be delivered to,
 
(1) Your Full Name....
(2) Your Address......
(3) Your Country......
(4) Your City..........
(5) Your Phone number....
(6) Your Occupation..........
(7) 
Your Copy of your ID or driver license
.....
 
Urgent get back to us today with your full address where your funds
will be delivered to because i will not be in the office next week,
 
SINCERELY,
Dr George Lawrence
Email=tntcourierfastservice01@fastservice.com

subject: Re: ATTENTION
body:
Hello Dr. George Lawrence,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's great to hear that my funds have been approved and deposited with TNT delivery company.

Could you please provide me with more details about these funds? I'm curious to know how this came about as it was quite unexpected. 

Also, could you clarify what exactly is required from my end for the delivery of these funds? You mentioned some personal information but it seems like the list got cut off.

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Patrice
